hero.description: AI-accelerated development makes custom software viable for small and medium businesses. Own your tools, ditch the subscriptions, and get solutions built exactly for how you work.

mission.title: The Rules Have Changed
mission.description: What used to cost €100K+ and take months is now achievable at a fraction of the cost. AI-powered development has democratized custom software—making it a smart investment for SMEs, not just enterprises.
mission.benefit1Description: No more monthly SaaS fees adding up. You own the code, the data, and the future of your software.
mission.benefit2Description: Forget one-size-fits-all. Get software tailored to your exact workflows and business needs.
mission.benefit3Description: AI-accelerated development means we deliver in weeks, not months. Your ideas become reality faster.

services.title: Solutions That Fit
services.description: From customer-facing web apps to internal tools, we build software that works the way your business works.
services.webAppsDescription: Modern, responsive web apps built with cutting-edge technologies for performance and scalability.
services.mobileAppsDescription: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that your customers will love to use.
services.customToolsDescription: Internal dashboards, automation tools, and business software tailored to your operations.
services.apiIntegrationsDescription: Connect your systems seamlessly. We build integrations that make your tools work together.

process.title: From Idea to Launch
process.description: A streamlined process designed for speed without sacrificing quality. We keep you involved at every step.
process.step1Description: We learn your business, understand your needs, and define the scope of your project.
process.step2Description: We plan the architecture, design the interface, and map out every feature.
process.step3Description: Rapid, AI-accelerated development with regular check-ins and demos.
process.step4Description: We deploy your software, train your team, and provide ongoing support.

portfolio.title: Projects in Progress
portfolio.description: We're currently building exciting projects for our first clients. Soon, you'll see real results here.
portfolio.earlyBirdMessage: Want to be one of our first clients? Early adopters get priority attention and special rates.

cta.title: Ready to Own Your Software?
cta.description: Stop renting solutions that don't quite fit. Let's build something that's truly yours—designed for your business, owned by you, forever.

servicesPage.title: Software Solutions That Fit Your Business
servicesPage.description: We build custom software that solves real problems. From web applications to mobile apps, every solution is tailored to your specific needs and workflows.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Modern, responsive web applications built with cutting-edge technologies. From customer portals to complex dashboards, we deliver performant and scalable solutions.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApps.description: Native and cross-platform mobile apps that your customers will love. We focus on intuitive UX and smooth performance across iOS and Android.

customTools.title: Custom Internal Tools
customTools.description: Streamline your operations with custom dashboards, automation tools, and business software designed around your exact workflows.

apiIntegrations.title: API & Integrations
apiIntegrations.description: Connect your systems seamlessly. We build robust APIs and integrate third-party services to make your tools work together.

techStack.title: Our Technology Stack
techStack.description: We use modern, battle-tested technologies that ensure your software is fast, secure, and maintainable.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We combine AI-accelerated development with proven methodologies to deliver quality software faster.

speed.title: AI-Accelerated
speed.description: Leveraging AI tools to accelerate development without compromising on quality.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Clean code, thorough testing, and best practices ensure long-term maintainability.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: We don't disappear after launch. Continuous support and updates as your needs evolve.

pricing.title: Custom Pricing for Every Project
pricing.description: Every business is different, so every project gets a custom quote. We work with your budget to deliver maximum value. No hidden fees, no surprises—just transparent pricing.

portfolioPage.title: Projects Coming Soon
portfolioPage.description: We're currently building exciting projects for our first clients. This page will soon showcase real results and success stories.

honestSection.title: We're Just Getting Started
honestSection.description: As a new agency, we don't have a portfolio of past projects to show you—yet. What we do have is a fresh approach, AI-accelerated development capabilities, and the dedication to make every early client a success story.

earlyBenefits.title: Why Be an Early Client?
earlyBenefits.description: Early adopters get special treatment. Here's what you can expect.

benefit1.title: Priority Attention
benefit1.description: With fewer clients, you get more of our focus and faster response times.

benefit2.title: Flexible Timeline
benefit2.description: We work around your schedule and adapt to your needs as the project evolves.

benefit3.title: Founding Partner Rates
benefit3.description: Special pricing for clients who help us build our portfolio and reputation.

cta.title: Be Part of Our Portfolio
cta.description: Your project could be the first featured here. Let's create something amazing together.

aboutPage.title: Building the Future of SME Software
aboutPage.description: We believe every business deserves custom software that fits perfectly. AI has made this possible—and we're here to make it happen.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Corweb was born from a simple observation: small and medium businesses have always needed custom software, but it's always been too expensive or too slow to build. Enterprise companies get tailored solutions while SMEs are stuck with one-size-fits-all SaaS tools that never quite fit.
story.paragraph2: The rise of AI-powered development has changed everything. What used to take months and cost hundreds of thousands of euros can now be delivered in weeks at a fraction of the price. This isn't just about faster coding—it's about democratizing access to custom software.
story.paragraph3: We started Corweb to bridge this gap. Our mission is to bring enterprise-quality custom software to businesses of all sizes, with transparent pricing, fast delivery, and solutions that actually solve your problems.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To make custom software accessible to every business, regardless of size. We combine AI-accelerated development with human expertise to deliver solutions that fit your exact needs—fast, affordable, and built to last.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide how we work and what we build.

value1.title: Honesty First
value1.description: We're upfront about what we can and can't do. No overpromising, no hidden fees, no surprises. If something isn't right for you, we'll tell you.

value2.title: Simplicity Over Complexity
value2.description: The best solutions are often the simplest. We don't over-engineer—we build exactly what you need, nothing more, nothing less.

value3.title: Your Success Is Our Success
value3.description: We're not just vendors—we're partners. Your project's success matters to us as much as it matters to you.

value4.title: Speed Without Sacrifice
value4.description: AI helps us move fast, but we never compromise on quality. Every line of code is reviewed, tested, and built to last.

whyNow.title: Why Now?
whyNow.description: The timing has never been better for custom software development.

reason1.title: AI-Powered Development
reason1.description: Modern AI tools accelerate development without compromising quality, making custom software affordable for SMEs.

reason2.title: Mature Ecosystems
reason2.description: The JavaScript ecosystem, cloud platforms, and open-source tools have reached a level of maturity that enables rapid, reliable development.

reason3.title: Remote-First World
reason3.description: Businesses are more digital than ever. The need for custom digital tools has never been greater.

cta.title: Let's Work Together
cta.description: Ready to build software that's truly yours? We'd love to hear about your project.
